title: Mouse Experiment Visualization
description: This project is a final project for DSC 106. The goal of the project is to visualize the effect of day/night and estrus periods over mices.

title: Interactive Data Visualization Of Bikers in Boston
description: This project performed a data visualization in JavaScript to display the bike traffic in the city of Boston with interactive features.

title: Data Analysis to Establish a Reliable Relationship Between Gamma Measurements and the Actual Density of the Material
description: The goal of this project is to establish a reliable relationship between gamma measurements and the actual density of the material. The results of the analysis will be used to develop a model that can predict the density of a material based on gamma measurements.

title: Data Analysis on Home Field Advantage in the Major League Baseball
description: This project performed a data analysis on home field advantage in the Major League Baseball. The analysis was conducted using data from the 2017 MLB season to the 2023 MLB season and focused on the impact of home field advantage on the outcome of games.

title: Prediction Model for the League of Legends Professional Scene at the 15 Minute Mark
description: The goal of this project is to predict the outcome of a professional League of Legends match at the 15 minute mark. The model will be trained on data from previous matches and will take into account the current state of the game at the 15 minute mark. The model will be evaluated on its ability to predict the outcome of matches in the future.
